entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InterpolatedStringHandlerArgumentAttribute("") is not correctly taken into account when the receiver is a struct #58514

Closed

  • IDE0161 - #endif not retained [C#] #58510
  • CS8345 (ERR_FieldAutoPropCantBeByRefLike) wording can be misleading #58513
  • Intellisense suggesting code improvement not supported for the project's C# version #58133
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove IsAutoPropertyWithGetAccessor #58515
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge main into features/RawStringLiterals #58511
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Adjust design behind Nullable analysis for target-typed expressions and add handling for target-typed new. #58509
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Language Feature - Target-Typed New
  • Cleanup Renamer.RenameDocumentAction API #58508
    Area-IDE
  • declaration errors #58507
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Make sure Index and Range are acceptable before offering refactorings #58516
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Report level 7 name warning for `record` when langversion is below 9 #58452
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Stack Trace Explorer improvements #58458
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers

Updated

  • Theme some dialogs #55971
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Allow nameof to access instance members. #48754
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update Public API files #41000
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Null Annotations
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enable indenter tests #58488
    Area-IDE
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers
  • SignatureHelp: guess best overload for incomplete invocations #31843
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Backlog
  • Allow valid metadata name characters in source generator hint names #58506
    Area-Compilers
